text: Mynhardt Kawanivi (born 3 March 1984) is a Namibian long distance runner who specialises in the marathon. He competed in the men's marathon event at the 2016 Summer Olympics where he finished in 70th place with a time of 2:20:45. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Namibian male long-distance runners Category:Namibian male marathon runners Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Namibia
title: Mynhardt Kawanivi
